Code.Name: Contract Notice Schema
Code.Description: A document used by a contracting party to announce a project to buy goods, services, or works.

Code.Name: Contract Award Notice Schema
Code.Description: A document published by a Contracting Party to announce the awarding of a procurement project.

Code.Name: Prior Information Notice Schema
Code.Description: A document used by a contracting party to declare the intention to buy goods, services, or works during a specified period.
